text: Yallaa kee kay farmoyta Nummayse maraw, Yallih niqmatay sin amol yani kassita, sin Qaduwwik sin dacriseemil, sin Qaduwwih yan mari Qidimih sinni gaboobi siinil fakam niyaate waqdiy Yalli ken gaboobi siinik yibbixeeh waase kassita, maqaane abittaanaah umaanek waasimtaanamal Yallak meesita, yeemeneh yan mari diini caagid kee Adduny√¢ Caagidil inkih Yallal keltoonay
